scripts.build-staging: mkdir -p ./dist/staging && NODE_ENV=staging browserify index.js -d -o dist/staging/app.js -t envify -t uglifyify
scripts.build-production: mkdir -p ./dist/production && NODE_ENV=production browserify index.js -o dist/production/app.js -t envify -t uglifyify
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run build-staging && aws s3 cp --recursive --acl public-read ./dist/staging/ s3://screencloud-cdn-staging/
scripts.deploy-production: npm run build-production && aws s3 cp --recursive --acl public-read ./dist/production/ s3://screencloud-cdn-production/
